div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
إن إن سلّم وبلغ برحمتك لڤلڤى
بن أسد وأبوكم رزمة عددها
خمسة عشر ثوب مرتفعة
الثّمن ستّة عشر دينار منها
ثلث عشر تم اللّه خير حفظا
وهو الرّحمن الرّحيم لا حول ولا قوّة
إلّا باللّه الولي العظيم

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
ʾin ʾinna sullima wa balaġa bi raḥmati ka li FlFy
bni ʾasad:in wa ʾabū kum rizmaẗ:an ʿadadu hā
ḫamsaẗa ʿašara ṯawb murtafiʿaẗu
ăṯ ṯamani sittaẗa ʿašara dīnār min hā
ṯalāṯa ʿašara tamma ăl lāhu ḫayru ḥufaẓāʾa
wa huwa ăr raḥmānu ăr raḥīmu lā ḥawla wa lā quwwaẗa
ʾillā bi ăl lāhi ăl waliyyi ăl ʿaẓīmi

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Verily there has been delivered - and may it have arrived with your pardon - to ... ... ...
b. Asad and your father a bale (containing clothes) numbering
fifteen garments, amounting
in price to sixteen dînârs, of which
thirteen are complete. God is the best Preserver (of all things).
He is the Compassionate, the Merciful, there is no strength nor power
but by means of God, the High, the Great.
